org.idmunit.extension
Class EmailUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.idmunit.extension.EmailUtil

public class EmailUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Provides an email tool for IdMUnit alerts. This version supports text email messages. The next version will support HTML content based off an HTML file template.

Version:
%I%, %G%
Author:
Brent Kynaston, Software Engineer, TriVir LLC
See Also:
Alert, IdMUnitTestCase

Method Detail

sendEmailNotification

public static void sendEmailNotification(Alert alert,
                                         java.lang.String content,
                                         java.lang.String exceptionMessage,
                                         java.util.Map dynamicContent)
                                  throws IdMUnitException
Sends an email

Parameters:
alert - Contains alert configuration
content - Email content - generally used in the subject line. May be pre-pended to the message body as well.
exceptionMessage - The actual Java Exception message buffer describing the problem and/or error
dynamicContent - (RESERVED FOR FUTURE USE) This will provide a collection of substitution information for the dynamic keys/variables located throughout the HTML template
Throws:
IdMUnitException
See Also:
IdMUnitTestCase
